sentences.en: GM's concerns over intellectual property could also scupper a bid by BAIC.
sentences.cn: 通用在知识产权方面的忧虑也同样会使北汽的投标面临险境.

sentences.en: That, in turn, would scupper the decision of ten other states to adopt the same standard.
sentences.cn: 继而, 这会摧毁其他十个州将采用相同标准的决定.

sentences.en: The outlet pipe's ends fixed by duct. The floor slopes towards the scupper.
sentences.cn: 排水管的末端用管支架固定. 地板应向排水口倾斜以防积水.

sentences.en: The scupper and outlet pipes are made of steel.
sentences.cn: 排水口和排水管的材料为钢质.

sentences.en: The Scupper Pump failed in the afternoon.
They worry it could be used to scupper merger and acquisition deals.
sentences.cn: 他们担心,《反垄断法》可能被用于阻挠并购交易.

sentences.en: Tom goes home to scupper up every evening.
sentences.cn: 每天晚上汤姆回家都要喝酒.

words.tran_cn: 排水口；水性杨花的女人

trans.tran_en: a hole in the side of a ship that allows water to flow back into the sea
to deliberately sink your own ship
